info.description:
### Prerequisites

- Postman
- Together AI Account: [https://api.together.xyz/](https://api.together.xyz/)
    

### Usage

1. Create a fork
2. Update collection variables
3. Send requests
    

### Documentation

- API: [https://docs.together.ai/docs/quickstart](https://docs.together.ai/docs/quickstart)
- Models: [https://api.together.xyz/models](https://api.together.xyz/models)
    

### About Together AI

The fastest cloud platform for building and running generative AI.
